events.name: ColdChainTemperatureAlert
events.description: Triggers when temperature breaches limits in the cold chain.

events.name: ColdChainShipmentDelayed
events.description: Records delays in cold chain shipments affecting delivery times.

events.description: Indicates a scheduled maintenance for cold chain equipment.

events.name: ColdChainRouteOptimization
events.description: Event for optimizing routes based on environmental factors.

events.name: ColdChainComplianceCheckFailed
events.description: Logs a failure in meeting compliance standards for cold chain.

events.name: ColdChainInventoryLow
events.description: Notification when inventory of cold chain items is low.

commands.name: TriggerTemperatureAlert

commands.name: OptimizeRoute
commands.description: Event for optimizing routes based on environmental factors.

commands.description: Logs a failure in meeting compliance standards for cold chain.
